definition: surname Yin/abbr. for 印度[Yin4 du4]
to print/to mark/to engrave/a seal/a print/a stamp/a mark/a trace/image
to make a deeper impression on sb

sentences.english: Post-impressionism reflected a number of the same attitudes as symbolism in literature.
sentences.chinese: 后印象派反映了大量与文学象征主义相似的态度。

sentences.english: First impressions of Sumatra are not good.
sentences.chinese: 苏门答腊给我的第一印象并不好。

sentences.english: And i have no idea how the hell you get the impressions that Okinawans are pro-Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道你怎么会有冲绳县民亲华的印象。

sentences.english: That apparently made quite an impression on the president's young daughter.
sentences.chinese: 着很显然给总统的小女儿留下了很深的印象。

sentences.english: Thickness and quality of the glass are impressive.
sentences.chinese: 透镜的厚度和质量令人印象深刻。

sentences.english: A. Which program impresses you the most during the Spring Festival Evening Gala last night?
sentences.chinese: 昨天春晚的哪个节目你印象最深刻？

sentences.english: I'm generally pretty impressed by what the, what my classmates  have gotten up to before they came to school here.
sentences.chinese: 我的同学在入学之前已经完成的事情让我印象深刻。

sentences.english: They asked me for my impressions of the fair tonight.
sentences.chinese: 他们约请我今晚去谈谈对交易会的印象。

sentences.english: This gave the impression that the police were content simply to look on.
sentences.chinese: 这给了大众一种印象，警方仅仅满足于作壁上观。

sentences.english: Well,Simon,you certainly made a good impression on that customer.
sentences.chinese: 干得好，赛蒙，你一定给客户留下了一个好印象。

sentences.english: Our dream is to change this bad image.
sentences.chinese: 我们的梦想是扭转这种不良印象。

sentences.english: Who impressed you the most in the “Happy Girls”?
sentences.chinese: 这届的快乐女声谁给你留下的印象最深？

sentences.english: A:I will try my best to make a good impression, but it is always easier said that done.
sentences.chinese: 我会尽最大努力留下好印象，可是说来容易做时难。

sentences.english: Knuth impression of depth inside I spoke with the generation.
sentences.chinese: 印象中Knuth的第一卷里面深入讲了排列的生成。

sentences.english: Turned free and easy of go away, let figure burger in your mind.
sentences.chinese: 转身洒脱的走开，让你的头脑中留下美图汉堡的印象。

sentences.english: I believe that Newton was different from the conventional picture of him.
sentences.chinese: 我相信牛顿与我们传统印象中的那个人不同。

definition: to leave behind/to stay behind/to remain/to keep/not to let (sb) go
to feel/to become aware of/feeling/sense/perception/CL:個|个[ge4]
to know/to recognize/to be familiar with/to get acquainted with sb/knowledge/understanding/awareness/cognition
to enter deeply into people's hearts/to have a real impact on the people (idiom)
to be disgusted with/to dislike/bad reaction/antipathy
